byline.contributor: This article is by Daniel Berehulak, who won the 2015 Pulitzer Prize for feature photography, as told to Jeffrey Marcus, who reported from New York.

lead_paragraph: Daniel Berehulak, a Pulitzer Prize-winning photographer, travels to a remote village in Nepal at the epicenter of the earthquake where many are still missing and grief lingers.

headline.print_headline: High in the Himalayas, a Search Yields Grim Results
headline.main: High in the Himalayas, a Search After the Nepal Quake Yields Grim Results

snippet: Daniel Berehulak, a Pulitzer Prize-winning photographer, travels to a remote village in Nepal at the epicenter of the earthquake where many are still missing and grief lingers.
abstract: Barpak Journal; residents of remote Nepalese village of Barpak are still recovering bodies of earthquake victims; inaccessible area was epicenter.
